name: Player/Streaming
description:
Most cases require an MLB.TV stream with two video feeds, one Away and one Home.

**User should be logged in with entitled MLB.TV account**

name: Archive
description:
Archive games should follow same entitlement rules as MLB.TV

(User must have TV Premium, At Bat Premium, or Single Team account)

name: Location Services
description: For most cases, user should be logged in with MLB.TV account and have already verified they can play back media
